attributes.action: put a FULL STOP to child cruelty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: its 2009 and there are still children living in disgrace and being abandoned, abused and not look after the way they should be iv been through it all and i think thers still not enough being done changes need to be made now!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
